content: Return to the path and go right to follow the fox guai through a tunnel in the mountains. Collect the green Wisp straight up ahead and squeeze through the crack to continue following the fox. Stick with her right up until you reach the part of the mountain where a fire is raging.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Woods_of_Ember_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Woods of Ember Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Ashen Pass II'.
The content is as follows:
Return to the path and go right to follow the fox guai through a tunnel in the mountains. Collect the green Wisp straight up ahead and squeeze through the crack to continue following the fox. Stick with her right up until you reach the part of the mountain where a fire is raging.
